tasks.action: Initialize GitHub repository with main and codex branches
tasks.context: Set up version-controlled environment for Vibeflow with a dedicated branch for Codex agent commits.
tasks.prompt: Create a new GitHub repository named vibeflow. Add two branches: main and codex. Ensure branch protections are enabled for main.
deliverables: GitHub repo with main and codex branches

tasks.action: Configure GitHub Actions workflows for linting and tests
tasks.context: Set up CI pipeline to automatically validate commits with linting and Jest tests.
tasks.prompt: Create workflows in .github/workflows for linting and running Jest tests on each commit.
tests: Push dummy commit to trigger workflows

tasks.action: Add Jest sanity test to validate pipeline
tasks.context: Confirm that CI pipeline runs Jest correctly by adding a trivial test.
tasks.prompt: Create sanity.test.ts with a trivial test to ensure Jest executes properly.

tasks.context: Prepare secure storage of secrets for API connectivity in later phases.
tasks.prompt: Add placeholders for API keys in GitHub secrets (e.g., OPENAI_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY).
tests: Confirm secrets are accessible in GitHub Actions environment
